long_description: With its light weight and medium size, this Innova disc bag is perfect for players who don't want to lug a cumbersome, heavy load around the course. Holds up to twelve discs with room to spare for accessories. Soft terry cloth interior, detachable dividers and a disc sleeve protect discs. Quick-access pocket on the front holds putter disc. Zippered compartment on back secures scorecards, pencils, rulebook, snacks and more. Water bottle pocket holds bottles up to 32 fl. oz. Water-resistant material and reinforced bottom protect contents and stand up to heavy use. Padded, adjustable shoulder strap allows comfortable carry. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: With its light weight and medium size, this Innova disc bag is perfect for players who don't want to lug a cumbersome, heavy load around the course.
